name: com.explainable.xr
description: Explainable XR: Understanding User Behaviors of XR Environments using LLM-assisted Analytics Framework. Refer to our paper, Explainable XR (IEEE TVCG by Yoonsang Kim et al.), for details.

samples.description: Testbed scene demonstrating log actions in Unity Editor via Explainable XR. Run this scene and follow how we generate the output json file. Recommended to first-timers.
Sample scene to demonstrate how to log actions in VR (e.g., Quest 3) via Explainable XR.
Sample scene to demonstrate how to log actions in AR (e.g., iPad Pro) via Explainable XR.
